name: Dimension Tension
description:
Dimension Tension is a game made for the LOWREZJAM. Inspired by things such as Portal, Fez, and Quake, this is a First-Person + Platformer experiment! 

Equipped with the ability to swap between two different dimensions, you must complete get through 1 zone, and find out what has been emitting strange energy signals from the long-abandoned Colony10-02!

*<>*

Music By: Hew Wagner

Art & Programming  By: SplendidDog

*<>*

CONTROLS

---------------------------------

3D

Move - W A S D

Swap - RIGHT CLICK or 'E'

---------------------------------

2D

Move - A D

Jump - SPACE

Swap - LEFT CLICK or 'Q'
